features: Molecular Iodine: ioRinse RTU is a patented, molecular iodine mouthwash that has won several professional awards; Molecular iodine is used in thousands of dental offices where professional strength is needed; Now you can get the same professional strength that dentists rely on

Alcohol-Free and Gentle on Sensitive Teeth: Our ioRinse RTU Mouthwash is formulated without alcohol, making it ideal for individuals with sensitive teeth or those who prefer an alcohol-free option;The gentle formula has won professional awards and is the choice of leading dentists for its effectiveness

Convenient and Easy to Use: ioRinse RTU Mouthwash comes in a 1 liter bottle, making it perfect for daily use as a long lasting mouthwash; Simply rinse vigorously for 30 seconds and then spit for a professional-level cleaning experience right at home

Professional Grade: The unique, patented, professional strength molecular iodine formula works effectively in thousands of dental offices and has won awards for its effectiveness; Thanks to the properties of molecular iodine, ioRinse RTU cleanses your mouth with professional care

About ioTech: ioTech’s award-winning products are chosen by thousands of dental professionals because of their superior effectiveness; Doctors know the power of ioTech products; Now these superior products are available direct-to-you; Iotech products are developed and produced here in the USA

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressed on the first use
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been battling with bad breath on and off for 5+ years. Not sure why but every mouthwash I ever tried leaves a bitter taste in my mouth, often times making me feel like my BB got worse. This is the first mouthwash that actually gave me that ‘clean’ feeling. No bitter aftertaste or weird tongue sensation. Unbelievable! I now understand why this is so freaking expensive. The quality is unmatched. Although I’ve only used it once so far you guys have earned a life long customer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Addresses the source of many mouth issues: liquid dentist
reviews.reviewText: If you're thinking about buying IoRinse, then you've probably done your homework on Molecular Iodine and what it can do. Here's what I can offer: 1) the Soft Mint has no taste at all other than a slight minty taste - any "iodine-y" taste you get will be after you spit it out, on an in-breath, and after 4 months of use, that is barely noticeable; 2) It has cured, or severely mitigated a gum infection that was turning painful and concerning; 3) having lived in West Palm Beach for a while, I can tell you that there is a large, firmly-entrenched sub-culture in the area that is both knowledgeable and serious about their health supplements (IoTech is based in Boca Raton, very near WPB;) 4) I can't afford to even sit in a dentist's chair without dental insurance. So, I researched and tried to educate myself on affordable, doable solutions. Molecular Iodine is one. After trying all OTC toothpastes, mouth rinses and folk-remedies, I came upon Molecular Iodine after putting iodine on a nasty scrape and thinking, I wish I could put iodine on my gum infection, even knowing that in its concentrated form iodine is a poison. Ah, science! Research led to the IoTech company and IoRinse. I'm grateful to have found it and sorry I wasted all that money on advertised products that did not touch the root of the problem. While not a substitute for high-end dentistry, IoRinse can help with many mouth and gum issues, and incidentally provides soothing relief for mouth/gum/tooth pain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Do not use this everyday! Will color your teeth!
reviews.reviewText: So I've been having a whirlwind of dental problems and have been in and out of dentists for the past few years. I landed an appointment with a very well to do dentist in my area, (finally caved with the expensive consult fee as the other dentists I had seen were more on budget but not helpfulI and i needed answers I was not getting from the lower end of the spectrum.) The initial thing that stuck out to me the most during this visit was when they had me do a "quick rinse." In the past, this had been done with mouthwash. This doctor had this mouthwash. Naturally I snuck a pic and ordered on Amazon same day. I was using it daily and when I went back to that dentist, I had mentioned during my "quick rinse" that I had purchased the same mouthwash and he promptly informed me that it was no for everyday use. It is specifically for after oral surgeries when you need to keep your open wounds clean and daily use after the prescribed time frame would result in your teeth weakening and they would turn purple. I stopped daily use, used as prescribed and once the bottle was empty I never re ordered. Im posting this review for the folks who are desperately looking for any help they can get with their teeth and wanted to let you know that although it does work as intended, this is not for daily use and there are undesirable results when used everyday. (For anyone wondering, I passed on the expensive dentist and his 90k estimate.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I think all mouthwash tastes like it should be spat out..
reviews.reviewText: No matter what brand, I think all mouthwash is supposed to taste like it should not be ingested.That said, the flavor of this mouthwash isn't that bad. I didn't choke or gag. It does leave a very tingly feeling in your mouth for a little while, but not the burn that some other brands leave.My gums were slightly inflamed, and this took it away instantly. I am a little concerned about the potential for discoloration of teeth, so I will use this as needed instead of twice daily.Overall, I think it's a genius product and it will definitely be a mainstay in my home.
